oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The women must not eat meat from the shoulder blades of the springbok, or the arrows will miss the game. This is called 'when we shoot our death'. 1) See also !nanna-sse, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Missing the game
